channel.title: Journal of Simulation | Open Source Toolkit

item.title: Ciw: An open-source discrete event simulation library
item.description:
Publishing date: 2018-05-20

Published on: Journal of Simulation

summary: This paper introduces Ciw, an open-source library for conducting discrete event simulations that has been developed in Python. The strengths of the library are illustrated in terms of best practice and reproducibility for computational research. An analysis of Ciwâ€™s performance and comparison to several alternative discrete event simulation frameworks is presented.

authors: Geraint I. Palmer et al.

link to paper: https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/abs/10.1080/17477778.2018.1473909
